mechanics.outcome: Character gains an Ability Score Improvement choice

mechanics.trigger: Applying an Ability Score Improvement choice
mechanics.condition: Player chooses to increase one ability score
mechanics.outcome: The chosen ability score increases by 2

mechanics.trigger: Applying an Ability Score Improvement choice
mechanics.condition: Player chooses to increase two different ability scores
mechanics.outcome: The two chosen ability scores each increase by 1

mechanics.trigger: Attempting to increase an ability score using this feature
mechanics.outcome: The ability score cannot be increased above 20

description_text: When you reach 4th level, and again at 6th, 8th, 12th, 14th, 16th, and 19th level, you can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. As normal, you can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.
